title: additionalItems
description: describes extra items, if "tuple typing" is being used.
content: If the value of "items" is an array ("tuple typing"), and if the instance is longer than the list of schemas in "items", then the additional items are described by the schema in this property.
If this value is false, then the instance cannot be longer than the list of schemas in "items". If this value is "true", that is equivalent to the empty schema (anything goes).
